name: get_verses
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool bible_memory_verse_flashcard.
Tool description: This KJV Bible API v2 allows users to retrieve verses/chapters in 1 of 8 formats.
API description: Takes parameters and returns requested verse OR Range of Verses in one of 8 text formats. 
Example:   verse_num1 = 1 , verse_num2  = 5 will return verses( 1, 2, 3, 4, 5)

text_mode.description: The text format to return the verse in.

book_name.description: The name of the book of the Bible.

uppercase_mode.description: Whether to return the verse in uppercase. Defaults to None.

verse_num2.description: The ending verse number. Defaults to 5.

verse_num1.description: The starting verse number. Defaults to 1.

chapter.description: The chapter number of the book. Defaults to 1.
